title: Add .clang-format
body_html:
As discussed, I am adding the .clang-format we have in fbcode. This change is 100% harmless to anyone not interested in using clang-format. This PR does not mandate formatting or add any automatic formatting. The only difference is that people who do like using clang-format (e.g. using Nuclide's format feature) will have consistent formatting.

@apaszke

body:
As discussed, I am adding the `.clang-format` we have in fbcode. This change is 100% harmless to anyone not interested in using clang-format. This PR does not mandate formatting or add any automatic formatting. The only difference is that people who do like using clang-format (e.g. using Nuclide's format feature) will have consistent formatting.

@apaszke
